t: 1:1*r Greek Silvanus*i , a variant of Silas*i
1:4*r The Greek word for brothers*i and*i sisters*i (adelphoi) refers here to believers, both men and women, as part of God’s family; also in 2:1, 9, 14, 17; 3:7; 4:1, 10, 13; 5:1, 4, 12, 14, 25, 27.
4:4*r Or learn*i to*i live*i with*i your*i own*i wife*i ; or learn*i to*i acquire*i a*i wife*i
4:6*r The Greek word for brother*i or*i sister*i (adelphos) refers here to a believer, whether man or woman, as part of God’s family.
